mods.abstract: $20 REWARD! RUN AWAY from my place on the 9th inst., the negro woman FRANCOISE. She is one of the negroes purchased from Messrs. Vignes & Lebeau. She is about 25 or 30 years old; black, stout, likely girl. I will give the above reward for the delivery of the said girl to me, first plantation above Waterloo. July 28, 1860. JAMES HUTCHES. July 28, 1860.

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1900
